post.summary:
Uploads project data. If project with the same code and version exists, it will be updated.
If project has test runs, it can't be updated.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project code

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Optional project version

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project code.

parameters.name: feature
parameters.description: The feature code.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The project version. Default version if not provided.

get.summary: Returns the list of features for a specific project.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project code.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The project version. Default version if not provided.

get.summary: Returns the list of structures for a specific project.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project code.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The project version. Default version if not provided.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project code.

parameters.name: treeCode
parameters.description: The tree code.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The project version. Default version if not provided.

get.summary: Returns the graph of feature and attribute rlations.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project code.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The project version. Default version if not provided.

post.summary: Creates a new test run for the specified project.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project code.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The project version. Default version if not provided.

requestBody.description: The object containing the test run data.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of test runs for a specific project from the database.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project code for which to retrieve the test runs.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The project version. Default version if not provided.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific test run by ID.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Test run ID

delete.summary: Deletes a specific test run by ID.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Test run ID

post.summary: Completes a specific test run by ID. All test result in NEW status will be marked as SKIPPED.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: Test run ID

get.summary: Retrieves test results for a specific test run.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: The ID of the test run.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific test result for a given project, test run, and test result ID from the database.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: The ID of the test run.

parameters.name: testResultId
parameters.description: The ID of the test result.

put.summary:
Updates test result with provided Status and Report.
Supported Statuses: PASSED, SKIPPED, BLOCKED, INVALID, FAILED, NEW

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: The ID of the test run.

parameters.name: testResultId
parameters.description: The ID of the test result.

requestBody.description: The data to update the test result with.

parameters.name: testRunId
parameters.description: The ID of the test run.

parameters.name: testResultId
parameters.description: The ID of the test result.
